subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology
subSections.text:
Area word:
* {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*bjar ~ *p(i/u)r||to fly}} > {{cog|bo|འཕུར}},
* {{cog|mkh-pro|*par||to fly}} > {{cog|omx|ပဝ်||tr=pɔ}}; {{cog|mkh-vie-pro|*pər||to fly}} (> {{cog|vi|bay}}).

Cognate with {{och-l|翂|appearance of birds flying slowly}}, {{och-l|𦐈|fly, soar}}, {{och-l|奮|spread wings and fly}}.

Cantonese sense "fare" is from {{bor|zh|en|fare}}.

|mn=xm,tp,mg,hc,ph:pe/qz,lk,sx,km,hc:per/zz,kh,tn,yl,tc:poe/hui/tp,kh,hc,tc,mg:hoe
|mn_note=pe/per/poe - vernacular; hui - literary; hoe - only used in {{zh-l|飛行機|tr=-}}

|mn-t_note=buê1 - colloquial; hui1 - literary
|w=1fi
|mc=y
|oc=y

}}

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[fly]]
# to [[move]] in the [[sky]]; to [[hover]], to [[flutter]], to [[dart]]
# to [[disappear]]
# [[fast]]; [[rapid]]; [[swiftly]]
# [[very]]; [[extremely]]
# [[groundless]]; [[unfounded]]
# [[unexpected]]; [[accidental]]
# [[flying]]; [[suspending]]
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} [[ticket]]; [[fare]] {{zh-mw|c:張}}
# {{lb|zh|loanword}} [[femto-]] {{gloss|[[Appendix:SI units|SI unit]] prefix}}
# {{lb|zh|Xiamen|&|Zhangzhou|_|Hokkien}} to [[fizzle out]]; to [[fail]]; to [[fall through]]

Japanese

subSections.title: Kanji
Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{top2}}
* {{ja-r|飛%行|ひ%こう}}: aviation
* {{ja-r|飛%行%機|ひ%こう%き}}: airplane, aircraft
* {{ja-r|飛%行%場|ひ%こう%じょう}}: airfield, airport
* {{ja-r|飛%来|ひ%らい}}: come flying
* {{ja-r|飛%鳥|ひ%ちょう}}: flying bird
* {{ja-r|雄%飛|ゆう%ひ}}: launching out
* {{ja-r|飛%球|ひ%きゅう}}: fly ball
* {{ja-r|犠%飛|ぎ%ひ}}: sacrifice fly
* {{ja-r|飛%躍|ひ%やく}}: leaping, activity
{{mid2}}
* {{ja-r|突%飛|とっ%ぴ}}: erratic, offbeat
* {{ja-r|飛び上がる|とびあがる}}: spring, jump up
* {{ja-r|飛び込む|とびこむ}}: jump in
* {{ja-r|飛び切り|とびきり}}: extraordinary, superior
* {{ja-r|飛び魚|とびうお}}: flying fish
* {{ja-r|飛び子|とびこ}}: [[flying fish]] [[roe]]
* {{ja-r|飛び移る|とびうつる}}: jump from one thing to another
* {{ja-r|鳩を飛ばす|はと を とばす}}: fly a pigeon
* {{ja-r|檄を飛ばす|げき を とばす}}: issue a manifesto
* {{ja-r|叱り飛ばす|しかりとばす}}: rebuke strongly
{{bottom}}
